awards.description: DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE KICKAPOO TRADITIONAL TRIBE OF TEXAS TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS. ACTIVITIES:SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL BUILD CAPACITY OF OFFICE STAFF TO LEARN AND ADDRESS ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES, PROVIDE COMMUNITY EDUCATION OUTREACH, IMPLEMENT SOLID WASTE MANAGEMENT PRACTICES AND STRATEGIES TO PREVENT ILLEGAL DUMPING, RECYCLING ACTIVITIES, AND CONTINUE CAPACITY DEVELOPMENT FOR DRINKING WATER SYSTEM.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:QUARTERLY PROGRESS REPORTS, ANNUAL FEDERAL FINANCIAL REPORT, QUALITY MANAGEMENT PLAN, AND GEOGRAPHIC INFORMATION SYSTEM /GLOBAL POSITIONING SYSTEM QUALITY ASSURANCE PROJECT PLAN. THE INTENDED BENEFICIARY IS THE KICKAPOO TRADITIONAL TRIBE OF TEXAS.

awards.awarding_agency: Department of Housing and Urban Development
Department of Housing and Urban Development
